md:
giải nghĩa từ "mystic" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Mystic (noun) - mysticist (người thần bí)
	+ Meaning: A person who seeks to understand the mysteries of the universe, especially through spiritual practices.
	+ Example: "The mystic spent years studying ancient texts to gain insight into the nature of reality."
	+ Related words: spiritual, esoteric, occult, mysticism
	+ Antonyms: skeptic, rationalist, materialist

* Mystic (adjective) - thần bí, huyền bí
	+ Meaning: Having a spiritual or mysterious quality.
	+ Example: "The mystic forest was said to be inhabited by ancient spirits."
	+ Related words: mystical, esoteric, occult, mysterious
	+ Antonyms: ordinary, mundane, rational

Note: The word "mystic" can have different connotations depending on the context. In a spiritual or philosophical sense, it may refer to a person or thing that seeks to understand the mysteries of the universe. In a more general sense, it may refer to something that is mysterious or difficult to understand.
